moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Minimize
moves.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

moves.name: Smog
moves.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.description: If the opponents know any move also known by the user, the opponents are prevented from using it.

moves.name: Hex
moves.description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

moves.name: Memento
moves.description: The user faints when using this move. In return, it harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Pain Split
moves.description: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

moves.name: Overheat
moves.description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.
